mapper.sql: role_id as roleId,role_name as roleName,role_code as roleCode,parent_id as parentId,fcode,level,type,remark, create_date as createDate,creator,update_date as updateDate,updater,del_flag as delFlag
mapper.select: select from sys_role where role_id = #{_parameter} and del_flag = 0 limit 1

SELECT (CASE WHEN tmp.module_id is NULL THEN false ELSE true END) as checkFlag, m.module_name as moduleName,m.module_id as moduleId,m.parent_id as parentId from sys_module as m LEFT JOIN (SELECT module_id from sys_role_module where role_id = #{_parameter}) as tmp on m.module_id = tmp.module_id ORDER BY level asc,module_type asc,orders asc
